original: yum rdo rje kun tu bzang mo sa nga sho ri kas kyang nyid kyi sku la rnam par 'khril te mdun gyis bltas nas thabs cig go /
analyzed: yum rdo rje kun tu bzang mo sa nga sho ri kas kyang nyid kyi sku la rnam par 'khril te mdun gyis bltas nas thabs cig go /
translated: The mother Vajra SamantabhadrƒÅ also embraced his body and faced him.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid la @7b shar bar mkhyen nas sku mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid la @7b shar bar mkhyen nas sku mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Then the BhagavƒÅn, the Lord of the Supreme Secret, having understood all phenomena to be the equality of wisdom, entered into equipoise on the state called ‚Äúthe equality of the body, which is not an object of apprehension.‚Äù

original: gsung mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par zhugs so //
analyzed: gsung mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par zhugs so //
translated: He entered into the state called ‚Äúthe equality of speech, which is not an object of apprehension.‚Äù

original: thugs mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs te 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: thugs mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs te 'jug pa'am /
translated: He remained in the state called ‚Äúthe equality of mind, which is not an object of apprehension.‚ÄùüîΩThere was no apprehension of engagement,

original: ldog pa'am / rnam par ldog pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ldog pa'am / rnam par ldog pa mi dmigs so //
translated: disengagement, or complete disengagement.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des dbyings kyi ngang la mi g-yo bar mnal bzhin du yum rdo rje kun tu bzang mos stong pa nyid kyi glu 'di blangs te rnam par bskul lo //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des dbyings kyi ngang la mi g-yo bar mnal bzhin du yum rdo rje kun tu bzang mos stong pa nyid kyi glu 'di blangs te rnam par bskul lo //
translated: Then, the Bhagavat, the Lord of the Secret, having entered into the state of the realm of space, while lying down unmoving, the Mother Vajra SamantabhadrƒÅ sang this song of emptiness and roused him:

original: yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthus //
analyzed: yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthus //
translated: The power of the extremely unelaborate yoga of the emptiness of existence and nonexistence

original: nam mkha' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gshegs //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gshegs //
translated: Approaches the commitment like space.

original: ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol ba'i klong //
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol ba'i klong //
translated: The expanse of the ocean of wisdom is the realm of liberation.

original: mi gnas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas bzhengs //
analyzed: mi gnas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas bzhengs //
translated: Arise from the realm of space, which is nonabiding and nonapprehending!

original: zhes bskul nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad byang chub sems la shar bar mkhyen nas stong pa nyid kyi ngang las rdo rje'i sku mngon du phyung ste /
analyzed: zhes bskul nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad byang chub sems la shar bar mkhyen nas stong pa nyid kyi ngang las rdo rje'i sku mngon du phyung ste /
translated: Having been roused, the Bhagavat, the Lord of the Secret, knowing that all phenomena arise in bodhicitta, having manifested his vajra body from the state of emptiness,üîΩis like the moon rising in a clear sky.

original: dper na / nam mkha' dvangs pa las zla ba dri ma med par shar ba lta bu'o; ;de nas yum sa nga sho ri ka la gzigs te 'dzum pa rnam par mdzad do //
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' dvangs pa las zla ba dri ma med par shar ba lta bu'o; ;de nas yum sa nga sho ri ka la gzigs te 'dzum pa rnam par mdzad do //
translated: Then, gazing at the mother ≈öakyadevƒ´, he smiled.

original: dper na / nyi ma stong las 'od kyi zer bkye ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na / nyi ma stong las 'od kyi zer bkye ba lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the light rays that shine from a thousand suns.

original: de nas 'od kyi zer de dag las @8a *//
analyzed: de nas 'od kyi zer de dag las @8a *//
translated: Then from those light rays

original: byang chub kyi sprin mngon par 'khrigs te rol pa'i char mngon par phab pas rol pa sna tshogs kyi 'brug dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi glog dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi glu dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi gar dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sprin mngon par 'khrigs te rol pa'i char mngon par phab pas rol pa sna tshogs kyi 'brug dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi glog dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi glu dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi gar dang /
translated: clouds of offerings are formed. The rain of play is manifested. The thunder of various plays, the lightning of various plays, the offerings of various plays, the songs of various plays, the dances of various plays,

original: rol pa sna tshogs kyi rnga dang / dung dang / ker kor dang / gling bu dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi sgeg pa dang / steg pa dang / 'khyud pa dang / steng pa dang / sbyor ba dang /
analyzed: rol pa sna tshogs kyi rnga dang / dung dang / ker kor dang / gling bu dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi sgeg pa dang / steg pa dang / 'khyud pa dang / steng pa dang / sbyor ba dang /
translated: the drums, conches, cymbals, flutes, and various plays, the ornaments of various plays, the flirtations, the struttings, the embraces, the mountings, the unions,üîΩand the various plays are manifested.

original: bstim pa dang / mnyes pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyis gsol pa dang / myang ba dang / 'cha' ba dang / bde ba dang / spro ba dang / 'jo ba dang / 'jug pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyis dga' ba chen po la 'jug pa rnam par mdzad do //
analyzed: bstim pa dang / mnyes pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyis gsol pa dang / myang ba dang / 'cha' ba dang / bde ba dang / spro ba dang / 'jo ba dang / 'jug pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyis dga' ba chen po la 'jug pa rnam par mdzad do //
translated: They were pleased, and they were served with various enjoyments, tasted, chewed, were happy, delighted, melted, entered, and were engaged in great bliss with various enjoyments.

original: de nas yum kun tu bzang mo des spyan zim bag gis rnam par 'dud pa'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la rnam par bltas te rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag lus kun tu sa la brdabs nas rol pa chen po'i glu 'dis gsolüîΩpa btab bo //
analyzed: de nas yum kun tu bzang mo des spyan zim bag gis rnam par 'dud pa'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la rnam par bltas te rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag lus kun tu sa la brdabs nas rol pa chen po'i glu 'dis gsol pa btab bo //
translated: Then the mother Samantabhadrƒ´ gazed with half-closed eyes in a manner of bowing to the bhagavƒÅn, the lord of the supreme secret. She made a gesture of yoga with her body, striking the ground all over, and supplicated with this song of great enjoyment:

original: tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs thugs dam dbyings kyi lha //
analyzed: tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs thugs dam dbyings kyi lha //
translated: ‚ÄúThe two great assemblies are complete, the pledge is the space of the deity,

original: longs spyod rdzogs mdzad rol pa chen po'i sku //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs mdzad rol pa chen po'i sku //
translated: the enjoyment is the great enjoyment, the form is the great enjoyment,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod @8b bdag /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod @8b bdag /
translated: the vajrasattva is the good fortune of the self,

original: thabs kyis rol pa bde chen dbyings nas bzhengs //
analyzed: thabs kyis rol pa bde chen dbyings nas bzhengs //

analyzed: yig 'bru rdzas kyi sbyor pa las //
translated: Are from the combination of syllables and substances,

original: grub par snang yang rang bzhin med //
analyzed: grub par snang yang rang bzhin med //
translated: Though appearing to be accomplished, they are without nature.

original: ji ltar smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: ji ltar smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: Just as the characteristic of a mirage

original: zhing pa'i dus kyi zla ba la //
analyzed: zhing pa'i dus kyi zla ba la //
translated: Is the time of the farmer's field,

original: drod dang nyi ma'i sbyor ba las //
analyzed: drod dang nyi ma'i sbyor ba las //
translated: From the combination of heat and sun,

original: byis pa gdungs pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: byis pa gdungs pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: The nature of the tormented child

original: chu yis 'du shes ci bskyed kyang //
analyzed: chu yis 'du shes ci bskyed kyang //
translated: Generates the perception of water,

original: tshim pa'i rgyud ni ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: tshim pa'i rgyud ni ga la 'gyur //
translated: But how can it be the cause of satisfaction?

original: gsang sngags ming gi khyad par yang //
analyzed: gsang sngags ming gi khyad par yang //
translated: The special name of secret mantra

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs stong pa la //
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs stong pa la //
translated: Is the emptiness of non-apprehending nature,

original: mtshan ma'i tha snyad ming du btags //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i tha snyad ming du btags //
translated: Named with the conventions of signs.

original: de nyid stong pas ming mi dmigs //
analyzed: de nyid stong pas ming mi dmigs //
translated: That itself is empty, so the name is not apprehended.

original: dper na rmi lam rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: dper na rmi lam rang bzhin ni //
translated: For example, the nature of a dream

original: skyes bu gnyid kyi dbang gyur na //
analyzed: skyes bu gnyid kyi dbang gyur na //
translated: Is when a person is under the power of sleep,

original: thang gcig skad cig yud tsam dang // lo la sogs pa de bzhin du //
analyzed: thang gcig skad cig yud tsam dang // lo la sogs pa de bzhin du //
translated: and likewise years and so forth,

original: bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin myong //
analyzed: bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin myong //
translated: are experienced as happiness and suffering.üîΩJust as after awakening nothing is observed,

original: sangs nas ci yang mi dmigs ltar; ;de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa dag /
analyzed: sangs nas ci yang mi dmigs ltar; ;de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa dag /
translated: so it is with the practice of mantra.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la //
translated: The nature of emptiness

original: spyod pa'i rnam pa cir snang yang //
analyzed: spyod pa'i rnam pa cir snang yang //
translated: appears in the aspect of conduct,

original: brtags na dmigs pa kun dang bral //
analyzed: brtags na dmigs pa kun dang bral //
translated: but when examined, it is free from all reference points.

original: gzugs brnyan snang ba'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan snang ba'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The defining characteristic of the appearance of a reflection

original: dper na gdong dang me long la //
analyzed: dper na gdong dang me long la //
translated: is like a face and a mirror:

original: brten nas bzhin gyi gzugs byung yang //
analyzed: brten nas bzhin gyi gzugs byung yang //

original: red par gyur pa ga la yod //
analyzed: red par gyur pa ga la yod //
translated: but how can it be real?

original: de bzhin sngags kyi @14b dngos grub kyang //üîΩsgrub dang ting 'dzin yo byad la //
analyzed: de bzhin sngags kyi @14b dngos grub kyang // sgrub dang ting 'dzin yo byad la //
translated: Likewise, the siddhis of mantraüîΩarise in the manner of siddhis

original: brten nas dngos grub tshul byung yang //
analyzed: brten nas dngos grub tshul byung yang //
translated: in dependence on the requisites of accomplishment and samƒÅdhi,

original: gsol thob dmigs pa ga la yod //
analyzed: gsol thob dmigs pa ga la yod //
translated: but how can they be observed as real?

original: dri za gnas pa'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: dri za gnas pa'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: The nature of the abode of gandharvasüîΩis that the speech of gandharvas

original: mkha' 'am yid kyi mkha' ngos la //üîΩdri za'i gsungs ni gar byung yang //
analyzed: mkha' 'am yid kyi mkha' ngos la //üîΩdri za'i gsungs ni gar byung yang //
translated: arises in space or in the space of the mind.

original: grong khyer de yang de nas byung //
analyzed: grong khyer de yang de nas byung //
translated: And the city arose from that.

original: byung nas de yang mi rtag ltar //
analyzed: byung nas de yang mi rtag ltar //
translated: And having arisen, it is impermanent.

original: gsang sngags grub pa'i gnas dag kyang //
analyzed: gsang sngags grub pa'i gnas dag kyang //
translated: Likewise, the places of mantra accomplishment

original: chos sam yid kyi mkha' ngos la //
analyzed: chos sam yid kyi mkha' ngos la //
translated: Are the sky of phenomena or the mind.

original: rnal 'byor gsang bdag gar bskyed pa //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gsang bdag gar bskyed pa //
translated: The lord of secrets, the yogi, generates

original: de nyid gnas pa'i gzhal med khang //
analyzed: de nyid gnas pa'i gzhal med khang //
translated: The celestial palace that abides there.

original: byung yang de la gnas mi 'gyur //üîΩbrag ca grags pa'i mtshan ma ni //
analyzed: byung yang de la gnas mi 'gyur // brag ca grags pa'i mtshan ma ni //
translated: Though it arises, it does not abide there.üîΩThe sign of an echo

original: dper na ngos la sgras rkyen pas //
analyzed: dper na ngos la sgras rkyen pas //
translated: Is like a sound condition on a cliff.

original: ji bzhin sgra ltar brag ca 'byung //
analyzed: ji bzhin sgra ltar brag ca 'byung //
translated: An echo arises just like the sound.

original: byung yang sgrar thos dmigs pa med //
analyzed: byung yang sgrar thos dmigs pa med //
translated: Though it arises, the sound is heard without reference.

original: de bzhin sngags tshig bzlas pa'i sgra //üîΩdper na med las yod btags pa'i //
analyzed: de bzhin sngags tshig bzlas pa'i sgra // dper na med las yod btags pa'i //
translated: Likewise, the sound of mantra recitationüîΩIs like an empty sound based on a sign

original: mtshan ma la brten stong pa'i sgra //
analyzed: mtshan ma la brten stong pa'i sgra //
translated: Designated as existent from nonexistence.

original: brjod pa tsam du bstan par zad //
analyzed: brjod pa tsam du bstan par zad //
translated: It is taught to be mere expression.

original: ji ltar chu yi zla ba ni //
analyzed: ji ltar chu yi zla ba ni //
translated: Just as the moon in water

original: sgrib med mkha' las zla shar ba //
analyzed: sgrib med mkha' las zla shar ba //
translated: Is the moon rising in the sky free of obscurations

original: gzugs brnyan dvangs pa'i chu nang snang //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan dvangs pa'i chu nang snang //

original: snang yang gzung pa'i rtog med pa //
analyzed: snang yang gzung pa'i rtog med pa //

original: de bzhin gzugs snang phyag rgya yang //
analyzed: de bzhin gzugs snang phyag rgya yang //
translated: Likewise, the appearance of forms as mudras

original: sems kyi mkha' las skur gsal ba //
analyzed: sems kyi mkha' las skur gsal ba //

original: phyag rgya'i rigs 'dzin ngo la snang //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i rigs 'dzin ngo la snang //
translated: It appears to the vidyƒÅdhara of mudra.

original: de ltar snang yang 'dzin rtog bral //
analyzed: de ltar snang yang 'dzin rtog bral //
translated: Although it appears like that, it is free from the concept of grasping.

original: ji ltar char gyi rgyun bzhin du //
analyzed: ji ltar char gyi rgyun bzhin du //

original: chu las chu bur rnam par 'byung //
analyzed: chu las chu bur rnam par 'byung //
translated: Gives rise to water bubbles from water,

original: @15a *// de yang gcig gi rnam pa las //
analyzed: @15a *// de yang gcig gi rnam pa las //
translated: And from the aspect of one

original: mang pa'i rnam grangs du ma 'byung //
analyzed: mang pa'i rnam grangs du ma 'byung //
translated: Many enumerations arise.

original: sdud cing phyir yang dum bur 'chad //
analyzed: sdud cing phyir yang dum bur 'chad //
translated: They gather and then break apart again.üîΩIn the same way, the many aspects of samƒÅdhi

original: de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa yi; ;ting 'dzin rnam pa mang por 'dod //
analyzed: de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa yi; ;ting 'dzin rnam pa mang por 'dod //
translated: Are asserted to be the practice of yoga.

original: 'khrul pa snang ba'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: 'khrul pa snang ba'i rang bzhin ni //

original: spros bral dngos po stong pa las //
analyzed: spros bral dngos po stong pa las //

original: srog dang shed can byed pa po //
analyzed: srog dang shed can byed pa po //
translated: The life-force, the embodied being, the creator,

original: sems can pa la sogs par snang //
analyzed: sems can pa la sogs par snang //
translated: The sentient being, and so on, appear.

original: mig nad ngo la rdzas ltar snang //
analyzed: mig nad ngo la rdzas ltar snang //
translated: Like a substance that appears to one with an eye disease,

original: 'khrul pa kho na snang bar zad //
analyzed: 'khrul pa kho na snang bar zad //
translated: Delusion alone appears.

original: de bzhin sngags kyi lta ba yang //
analyzed: de bzhin sngags kyi lta ba yang //
translated: In the same way, the view of mantra

original: cho 'phrul mang po cir 'phrul pa; ;snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: cho 'phrul mang po cir 'phrul pa; ;snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin la //
translated: The many magical displays that manifest

original: 'khrul pa sna tshogs snang bar zad //
analyzed: 'khrul pa sna tshogs snang bar zad //

original: rnal 'byor can gyis de ltar blta //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gyis de ltar blta //

original: ji ltar mgal me'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: ji ltar mgal me'i rang bzhin ni //

original: gang dag lag na mgal me thogs //
analyzed: gang dag lag na mgal me thogs //

analyzed: bskor na 'khor lo'i rgyun ltar snang //

original: de la 'khor lo'i rang bzhin med //
analyzed: de la 'khor lo'i rang bzhin med //

original: de bzhin sngags kyi cho 'phrul yang //
analyzed: de bzhin sngags kyi cho 'phrul yang //

original: mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rang bzhin las //
analyzed: mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rang bzhin las //

original: ji ltar dmigs pa'i don 'byung ste //
analyzed: ji ltar dmigs pa'i don 'byung ste //

original: cho 'phrul sna tshogs rgyun mi 'chad //
analyzed: cho 'phrul sna tshogs rgyun mi 'chad //

original: de phyir mtshan ma'i chos thams cad //
analyzed: de phyir mtshan ma'i chos thams cad //

original: mtshan med ngang du gcig pas na //
analyzed: mtshan med ngang du gcig pas na //
translated: Are the same in the state of no characteristics.

original: rtog pa'i bag chags ci byung yang //
analyzed: rtog pa'i bag chags ci byung yang //
translated: No matter what conceptual traces arise,

original: chos kun dbyings su gcig pa'i phyir //
analyzed: chos kun dbyings su gcig pa'i phyir //
translated: Since all phenomena are the same in the dhƒÅtu,

original: rtog 'jug spros pa'i mtshan ma kun //üîΩma byung ma skyes @15b dbyings nyid la //
analyzed: rtog 'jug spros pa'i mtshan ma kun // ma byung ma skyes @15b dbyings nyid la //
translated: All conceptual elaborations and characteristicsüîΩDo not arise or occur in the unarisen dhƒÅtu.

original: g-yos pa med cing cho 'phrul 'byung //
analyzed: g-yos pa med cing cho 'phrul 'byung //
translated: They are unmoving, yet magical displays occur.

original: yon tan sna tshogs cher 'byung ba'i //üîΩgter gyi dbyig 'di gang mthong ba //
analyzed: yon tan sna tshogs cher 'byung ba'i // gter gyi dbyig 'di gang mthong ba //
translated: various qualities is seen by all.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan yang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan yang //
translated: The qualities of all buddhas

original: skad cig gcig la de la 'dus //
analyzed: skad cig gcig la de la 'dus //
translated: are gathered into that in an instant.

original: de bas yid bzhin rin chen 'di //
analyzed: de bas yid bzhin rin chen 'di //

original: ldog pa med pas dang du blang //
analyzed: ldog pa med pas dang du blang //
translated: is accepted without turning back.

original: don dam yang dag gter gyi mchog /
analyzed: don dam yang dag gter gyi mchog /
translated: The supreme treasure of the ultimate truth

original: rnal 'byor kun gyi nor mchog ste //
analyzed: rnal 'byor kun gyi nor mchog ste //
translated: is the supreme wealth of all yogins.

original: gang rtogs de 'thob gcig pu nyid //
analyzed: gang rtogs de 'thob gcig pu nyid //

original: 'brel med gzhan gyis thob par dka'//
analyzed: 'brel med gzhan gyis thob par dka'//
translated: it is difficult to obtain by others who are unrelated.

original: bdag med gnyis bral bde chen klong //
analyzed: bdag med gnyis bral bde chen klong //
translated: The space of great bliss free from the two types of selflessnessüîΩis the great bliss of all buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che; ;ye nas lhun grub 'dus ma byas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che; ;ye nas lhun grub 'dus ma byas //
translated: primordially spontaneous, and unconditioned.

original: thig le chos nyid ye 'byams pas //
analyzed: thig le chos nyid ye 'byams pas //
translated: Since the sphere of reality is timelessly infinite,

original: kun khyab brdal bas snying por 'dus //
analyzed: kun khyab brdal bas snying por 'dus //
translated: it is gathered into the essence through the all-pervading vastness.

original: mi dmigs spros bral byang chub sems //
analyzed: mi dmigs spros bral byang chub sems //
translated: The nonconceptual, unelaborated bodhicitta

original: zab mor snang ba'i nges don 'di //
analyzed: zab mor snang ba'i nges don 'di //
translated: is the definitive meaning that appears in the profound.

original: mkha' la mdud pa gting dpag dka'//
analyzed: mkha' la mdud pa gting dpag dka'//
translated: It is difficult to fathom the knot in space.

original: rnal 'byor dmigs ldan blo chung zhing //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dmigs ldan blo chung zhing //
translated: The yogin with a small mind who has a reference

original: gang zhig rtsal zhan de rtog pa //
analyzed: gang zhig rtsal zhan de rtog pa //
translated: and who has weak skill will conceptualize that.

original: g-yor mo'i tshul du bdag brtag pa //
analyzed: g-yor mo'i tshul du bdag brtag pa //
translated: It is like a mirage,

original: brtags kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩdper na nyi ma'i snying po la //
analyzed: brtags kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro // dper na nyi ma'i snying po la //
translated: and even if one examines it, one will not understand.üîΩFor example, if one examines

original: mig gi dbang pos rab brtags na //
analyzed: mig gi dbang pos rab brtags na //
translated: the essence of the sun with the eye,

original: de brtags don de mi rtogs kyi //
analyzed: de brtags don de mi rtogs kyi //
translated: one will not understand the meaning of that examination,

original: 'od kyi zer gyis mig rdzir 'gyur //üîΩde 'drar byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: 'od kyi zer gyis mig rdzir 'gyur // de 'drar byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: but the light rays of the sun will harm the eye.üîΩIn the same way, no matter how

original: zab mo'i don la cir brtags kyang //
analyzed: zab mo'i don la cir brtags kyang //
translated: one examines the meaning of the profound with the nature of a fool,

original: yang dag don de mi mthong gi /
analyzed: yang dag don de mi mthong gi /
translated: one will not see the meaning of reality,

original: blo zhan byis pa ga chad brgyal /
analyzed: blo zhan byis pa ga chad brgyal /
translated: but the weak-minded fool will faint.

original: @16a *// brtag tu med pa'i chos rnams ni //
analyzed: @16a *// brtag tu med pa'i chos rnams ni //
translated: The Dharma, which is not to be examined,

original: rtog pa can gyis mi rtogs te //
analyzed: rtog pa can gyis mi rtogs te //
translated: is not understood by those with concepts.

original: gang zhig de don mi rtogs phyir //
analyzed: gang zhig de don mi rtogs phyir //
translated: Since they do not understand that meaning,

original: g-yang sar ltung ba ci cha yod //
analyzed: g-yang sar ltung ba ci cha yod //
translated: what can be done about falling into an abyss?

original: gdod nas ma thos shin tu dge /
analyzed: gdod nas ma thos shin tu dge /
translated: From the beginning, it is not heard, but is extremely virtuous.

original: bsam dang bral bas de bzhin gzhag /
analyzed: bsam dang bral bas de bzhin gzhag /
translated: Since it is free from thought, it is left as it is.

original: mi rtag bzhag pa'i chos 'di gang //
analyzed: mi rtag bzhag pa'i chos 'di gang //
translated: This Dharma, which is left without permanence,

original: byis pa rnams la ngas ma bstan //
analyzed: byis pa rnams la ngas ma bstan //
translated: is not taught to fools.

original: bstan kyang go bar mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: bstan kyang go bar mi 'gyur te //
translated: Even if it is taught, it will not be understood.

original: bstan du med cing go bar dka'//
analyzed: bstan du med cing go bar dka'//
translated: It is not taught and is difficult to understand.

original: tshig gis brjod pa kun dang bral //
analyzed: tshig gis brjod pa kun dang bral //
translated: Is free from all verbal expression.

original: 'di zhes bstan du ga la yod //
analyzed: 'di zhes bstan du ga la yod //
translated: How can it be shown to be this or that?

original: med pas bstan pa'i dmigs mi phyed /
analyzed: med pas bstan pa'i dmigs mi phyed /
translated: Since it is not existent, it cannot be observed.

original: mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs shing //
analyzed: mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs shing //
translated: Train the mind in the non-apprehensible,

original: yid kyi me long gsal byas na //
analyzed: yid kyi me long gsal byas na //
translated: And clear the mirror of the mind.

original: nam mkha' dag la rab brtags na //
analyzed: nam mkha' dag la rab brtags na //
translated: When you examine the pure sky,

original: snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: The nature of the sky is non-appearance.

original: nam mkha' lta bur de nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bur de nyid 'gyur //
translated: It is like the sky itself.

original: chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu ste //
analyzed: chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu ste //
translated: The nature of phenomena is like the sky,

original: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
translated: But the sky has no characteristics.

original: nam mkha' gang min rjod byed pa //
analyzed: nam mkha' gang min rjod byed pa //
translated: What is not the sky is described,

original: brjod pa de nyid dngos po ste //
analyzed: brjod pa de nyid dngos po ste //
translated: But that description is itself an entity.

original: dngos po de yi ming brjod kyang //
analyzed: dngos po de yi ming brjod kyang //
translated: Although the name of that entity is expressed,

original: nam mkha' de la 'gag mi 'gyur //
analyzed: nam mkha' de la 'gag mi 'gyur //
translated: It does not obstruct the sky.

original: de bzhin mi rtog rjod byed pa //
analyzed: de bzhin mi rtog rjod byed pa //
translated: Likewise, the non-conceptual is described,

original: rjod pa de nyid rnam rtog lta //
analyzed: rjod pa de nyid rnam rtog lta //
translated: But that description is itself a concept.

original: rnam rtog de yi ming brjod kyang //
analyzed: rnam rtog de yi ming brjod kyang //
translated: Although the name of that concept is expressed,

original: mi rtog de la 'gag mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mi rtog de la 'gag mi 'gyur //
translated: It does not obstruct the non-conceptual.

original: de 'drar sems kyang de ltar blta //
analyzed: de 'drar sems kyang de ltar blta //
translated: The mind should be viewed in this way.

original: sems nyid gzhan du ma grub ste //
analyzed: sems nyid gzhan du ma grub ste //
translated: The mind itself is not established as anything else.

original: de bzhin chos kyang grub ma yin //
analyzed: de bzhin chos kyang grub ma yin //
translated: And likewise, phenomena are not established.üîΩMind and reality are nondual;

original: sems dang chos nyid gnyis @16b med de; ;sems nyid gang yin chos nyid de //
analyzed: sems dang chos nyid gnyis @16b med de; ;sems nyid gang yin chos nyid de //
translated: Whatever the mind is, that is reality,

original: chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin no //
translated: And reality is just like that.

original: chos sems gnyis med ldan gyur pa //
analyzed: chos sems gnyis med ldan gyur pa //
translated: When mind and phenomena are nondual,

original: bla med byang chub chen por bshad //
analyzed: bla med byang chub chen por bshad //
translated: It is explained as unsurpassed great awakening.

original: sems ni nam mkha' lta bu ste //
analyzed: sems ni nam mkha' lta bu ste //
translated: Mind is like space;

original: rnam par rtog bral gang mi rtogs //
analyzed: rnam par rtog bral gang mi rtogs //
translated: It is free from conceptualization and does not conceptualize.

original: de bzhin sa gzhi chen po ltar //
analyzed: de bzhin sa gzhi chen po ltar //
translated: Likewise, like the great earth,

original: bla med byang chub myu gu skyed //
analyzed: bla med byang chub myu gu skyed //
translated: It gives rise to the sprouts of unsurpassed awakening.

original: me yi rang bzhin ltar snang bas //
analyzed: me yi rang bzhin ltar snang bas //
translated: Like the nature of fire, it appears

original: rmongs pa'i bud shing sreg par byed //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i bud shing sreg par byed //
translated: And burns the firewood of delusion.

original: rlung gi rang bzhin yin pas na //
analyzed: rlung gi rang bzhin yin pas na //
translated: Like the nature of wind,

original: mi shes pa yi rdul kun sel //
analyzed: mi shes pa yi rdul kun sel //
translated: It clears away all the dust of ignorance.

original: chu yi rang bzhin yin pas na //
analyzed: chu yi rang bzhin yin pas na //
translated: Like the nature of water,

original: nyon mongs gdung ba kun sim byed //

translated: It is called difficult to fathom.

original: chos shes bya'o //
analyzed: chos shes bya'o //
translated: It is called the Dharma.

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called bodhisattva.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called buddha.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩ'jug pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'jug pa'i phyir ni /
translated: Why is that?üîΩBecause it enters, it is the path.

original: lam mo // 'khrul pa'i phyir ni /üîΩ'khor ba'o // ma shes pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: lam mo // 'khrul pa'i phyir ni / 'khor ba'o // ma shes pa'i phyir ni /
translated: Because it is deluded, it is sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: sems can no //
analyzed: sems can no //
translated: Because it is not understood, it is sentient beings.

original: sgrol ba'i phyir ni /
analyzed: sgrol ba'i phyir ni /
translated: Because it liberates, it is a boat.

original: gru'o // bskyod pa'i phyir ni /üîΩbgrod pa'o // bde ba'i phyir ni /
analyzed: gru'o // bskyod pa'i phyir ni / bgrod pa'o // bde ba'i phyir ni /
translated: Because it moves, it is a vehicle.

original: byang chub bo //üîΩdran pa nges pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: byang chub bo // dran pa nges pa'i phyir ni /
translated: Because it is blissful, it is awakening.

original: sems so // mkhas pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: sems so // mkhas pa'i phyir ni /
translated: Because it is the ascertainment of mindfulness, it is the mind.

original: shes rab bo //üîΩgsal ba'i phyir ni /
analyzed: shes rab bo // gsal ba'i phyir ni /
translated: Because it is skilled, it is wisdom.

original: ting 'dzin no //üîΩphyin pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: ting 'dzin no // phyin pa'i phyir ni /
translated: Because it is clear, it is samƒÅdhi.

original: @27a *// gnas so //üîΩzla med pa'i phyir ni /üîΩrab bo // ngo mtshar ba'i phyir ni /üîΩmchog go / 'phags pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: @27a *// gnas so // zla med pa'i phyir ni / rab bo // ngo mtshar ba'i phyir ni / mchog go / 'phags pa'i phyir ni /
translated: Because it goes beyond, it is a place.üîΩBecause it is without equal, it is excellent.

original: 'phags pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i phyir ni /
translated: Because it is wondrous, it is supreme.üîΩBecause it is noble, it is noble.

original: phul lo // dbang byed pa med pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: phul lo // dbang byed pa med pa'i phyir ni /
translated: I offer it.

original: bla na med pa'o //üîΩgting ring pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa'o // gting ring pa'i phyir ni /
translated: Because there is no higher, it is unsurpassed.

original: zab pa'o // gab pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: zab pa'o // gab pa'i phyir ni /
translated: Because it is deep, it is profound.

original: gsang ba'o // phra ba'i phyir ni /
analyzed: gsang ba'o // phra ba'i phyir ni /
translated: Because it is hidden, it is secret.

original: gting dpag dka' ba'o //
analyzed: gting dpag dka' ba'o //
translated: Because it is subtle, it is difficult to fathom.

original: kun 'byung ba'i phyir ni; chos so //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba'i phyir ni; chos so //
translated: Because it is the source of all, it is the Dharma.

original: sa non pa'i phyir ni //
analyzed: sa non pa'i phyir ni //
translated: Because it conquers the grounds,

original: byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: it is the bodhisattva.

original: mthar phyin pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: mthar phyin pa'i phyir ni /
translated: Because it is the ultimate,

original: sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas te /
translated: it is the Buddha.

original: sems dpa' chen po //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po //
translated: Great being,

original: de'i phyir na rnal 'byor gyi lam 'di shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir na rnal 'byor gyi lam 'di shes par bya ste /
translated: therefore, this path of yoga should be understood.

original: lam 'di ni /
analyzed: lam 'di ni /
translated: This path

original: chos thams cad kyi gzhi'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi gzhi'o //
translated: is the ground of all phenomena.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo //
translated: It is the mother of all buddhas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos thams cad 'di las byung ba'i phyir na gzhi'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad 'di las byung ba'i phyir na gzhi'o //
translated: Because all phenomena arise from it, it is the ground.

original: mthar phyin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam 'di nas gshegs par gyur to //
analyzed: mthar phyin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam 'di nas gshegs par gyur to //
translated: The buddhas who have reached the ultimate have traveled this path.

original: da ltar ston pa nyid kyang lam 'di nas gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: da ltar ston pa nyid kyang lam 'di nas gshegs pa ste /
translated: The teacher himself also travels this path.

original: de'i phyir lam 'di shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir lam 'di shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this path should be understood.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In that way,

original: de'i phyir lam 'di ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir lam 'di ni /
translated: Therefore, this path

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab ces kyang bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab ces kyang bya'o //
translated: is also called the father of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin du yum zhes kyang bya ba dang / sras zhes bya ba dang / bdag po zhes bya ba dang / gdung zhes bya ba dang / srog ces bya ba dang / bran zhes bya ba dang / sku zhes bya ba dang / gsung zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du yum zhes kyang bya ba dang / sras zhes bya ba dang / bdag po zhes bya ba dang / gdung zhes bya ba dang / srog ces bya ba dang / bran zhes bya ba dang / sku zhes bya ba dang / gsung zhes bya ba dang /
translated: Similarly, it is called the mother, the son, the lord, the family, the life, the servant, the body, the speech,

original: thugs zhes bya @27b dang / yon tan zhes bya ba dang / 'phrin las chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: thugs zhes bya @27b dang / yon tan zhes bya ba dang / 'phrin las chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: the mind, the qualities, and the great activity.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: thabs chen po dang / shes rab chen po dang / byang chub chen po dang / dbang chen po dang / de bzhin nyid dang / 'da' bar dka' ba dang / chos nyid la zad mi shes pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / rnam par brjid pa dang /
analyzed: thabs chen po dang / shes rab chen po dang / byang chub chen po dang / dbang chen po dang / de bzhin nyid dang / 'da' bar dka' ba dang / chos nyid la zad mi shes pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / rnam par brjid pa dang /
translated: It is because of the great method, the great wisdom, the great enlightenment, the great power, the suchness, the difficulty of transcending, the inexhaustibility in the dharmatƒÅ, the great compassion, and the splendor.

original: sna tshogs su ston pa dang / thams cad du mkhyen pa dang / cir yang 'byung ba dang / mdzad pa sna tshogs pa'i phyir de dag ni /üîΩde ltar yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs su ston pa dang / thams cad du mkhyen pa dang / cir yang 'byung ba dang / mdzad pa sna tshogs pa'i phyir de dag ni / de ltar yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: because it manifests in various ways, because it knows everything, because it arises in any way at all, and because it has various activities.üîΩTherefore, it should be understood as being like that.

original: de'i phyir yang lam 'di yongs su shes par bya'o; ;de bzhin du 'dod pa chen po zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang lam 'di yongs su shes par bya'o; ;de bzhin du 'dod pa chen po zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this path should be fully understood.

original: 'tsho ba chen po zhes bya ba dang / longs spyod chen po zhes bya ba dang / yo byad chen po zhes bya ba dang / rgyu zhes bya ba dang / rkyen zhes bya ba dang / 'bras bu zhes bya ba dang / spyod pa zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: 'tsho ba chen po zhes bya ba dang / longs spyod chen po zhes bya ba dang / yo byad chen po zhes bya ba dang / rgyu zhes bya ba dang / rkyen zhes bya ba dang / 'bras bu zhes bya ba dang / spyod pa zhes bya ba dang /
translated: It should be known as the great desire, the great life, the great enjoyment, the great equipment, the cause, the condition, the result, the practice,

original: cho 'phrul zhes bya ba dang / phyag rgya zhes bya ba dang / bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang / nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang / sgrub pa zhes bya ba dang / sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba dang / tshogs chen po zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: cho 'phrul zhes bya ba dang / phyag rgya zhes bya ba dang / bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang / nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang / sgrub pa zhes bya ba dang / sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba dang / tshogs chen po zhes bya ba dang /
translated: the miracle, the seal, the service, the close service, the achievement, the great achievement, the great gathering,

original: kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called ‚Äúcompletely perfected.‚Äù

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩyul la 'dod pa sna tshogs pa dang / dmigs pas 'tsho ba dang / 'jol nyog tu spyod pa dang / dgos pa sgrub pa dang // 'bras bur byed pa dang / kun tu log pa dang / don grub @28a *//üîΩba dang / smin par bsags pa dang / rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / bya ba byed pa dang / sna tshogs su 'byung ba dang / mtshan mar bstan pa dang / rnam par 'dud pa dang / shin tu mdzed pa dang / 'dod pa byed pa dang /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / yul la 'dod pa sna tshogs pa dang / dmigs pas 'tsho ba dang / 'jol nyog tu spyod pa dang / dgos pa sgrub pa dang // 'bras bur byed pa dang / kun tu log pa dang / don grub @28a *// ba dang / smin par bsags pa dang / rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / bya ba byed pa dang / sna tshogs su 'byung ba dang / mtshan mar bstan pa dang / rnam par 'dud pa dang / shin tu mdzed pa dang / 'dod pa byed pa dang /
translated: Why is that?üîΩIt is to be understood because of the various desires for objects, the livelihood of objectification, the conduct of confusion, the accomplishment of purpose, the making of results, the complete reversal, the accomplishment of meaning, the accumulation of ripening, the natural state, the performance of functions, the arising of variety, the teaching of signs, the bowing down, the extreme respect, the doing of what is desired,

original: lhag par 'dod pa dang / kun tu 'byor ba dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir yongs su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag par 'dod pa dang / kun tu 'byor ba dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir yongs su shes par bya'o //
translated: the excessive desire, the complete attainment, and the spontaneity.

original: gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs //
translated: Moreover, Great Assembly,

original: 'di la ni /
analyzed: 'di la ni /
translated: in this regard,

original: thams cad yod de /
analyzed: thams cad yod de /
translated: everything exists.

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: All phenomena

original: rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum du 'dus par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum du 'dus par shes par bya'o //
translated: are to be understood as included in the three types of yoga.

original: gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: rgyu'i rnal 'byor dang / rkyen gyi rnal 'byor dang / 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum yang 'di nyid yin zhing 'di las 'byung bar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: rgyu'i rnal 'byor dang / rkyen gyi rnal 'byor dang / 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum yang 'di nyid yin zhing 'di las 'byung bar shes par bya ste /
translated: One should understand that this is also the three yogas: the causal yoga, the conditional yoga, and the resultant yoga.

original: de yang ji ltar zhe na /üîΩrgyu ni / 'khrul pa gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang ji ltar zhe na / rgyu ni / 'khrul pa gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o //
translated: How is that?üîΩThe cause is the single delusion.

original: de bzhin du mtshan ma gnyis dang / rtog pa gsum dang / log pa bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa lnga dang / phung po lnga dang / dbang po lnga dang / rgyu drug dang / rkyen bcu gnyis dang / skye ba bcu gnyis dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du mtshan ma gnyis dang / rtog pa gsum dang / log pa bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa lnga dang / phung po lnga dang / dbang po lnga dang / rgyu drug dang / rkyen bcu gnyis dang / skye ba bcu gnyis dang /
translated: One should understand this path in order to desire to awaken to the two signs, the three concepts, the four inversions, the five afflictions, the five aggregates, the five sense organs, the six causes, the twelve conditions, the twelve births,

original: rang bzhin bco brgyad dang / spyod pa bcu gcig dang / smon pa bzhi dang / lam lnga dang / gnas drug dang / mu gsum shes te @28b chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin bco brgyad dang / spyod pa bcu gcig dang / smon pa bzhi dang / lam lnga dang / gnas drug dang / mu gsum shes te @28b chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o //
translated: the eighteen natures, the eleven activities, the four aspirations, the five paths, the six abodes, and the three alternatives.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is the basis for the result of desire.

original: lam de nyid ma rig pa'i phyir 'khrul pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lam de nyid ma rig pa'i phyir 'khrul pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That very path is called ‚Äúdelusion‚Äù because of ignorance.

original: yul dang gnyis su gyur pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: yul dang gnyis su gyur pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because it is dualistic with respect to objects,

original: mtshan ma zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma zhes bya'o //
translated: it is called ‚Äúsign‚Äù.

original: dus gsum dngos por rtog pa'i phyir rtog pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dus gsum dngos por rtog pa'i phyir rtog pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Because it conceives of the three times as entities, it is called ‚Äúconception‚Äù.

original: nges pa las log pa'i phyir don las gol ba dang / mnyam pa las gol ba dang / phyogs las gol ba dang / gzhi las gol ba'i phyir log pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nges pa las log pa'i phyir don las gol ba dang / mnyam pa las gol ba dang / phyogs las gol ba dang / gzhi las gol ba'i phyir log pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Because it deviates from the meaning, deviates from sameness, deviates from the position, and deviates from the basis, it is called ‚Äúwrong‚Äù.

original: rgyu 'bras kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir mun pas 'thibs pa dang / sred pas gdungs pa dang / sdong pos non pa dang / mi phyed pas 'thas pa dang / kun nas 'khrugs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir mun pas 'thibs pa dang / sred pas gdungs pa dang / sdong pos non pa dang / mi phyed pas 'thas pa dang / kun nas 'khrugs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Because of the affliction of cause and effect, it is called ‚Äúaffliction‚Äù because of being obscured by darkness, tormented by craving, oppressed by the trunk, solidified by indivisibility, and completely agitated.

original: kun nas 'dus pa'i phyir rgyu 'dus pa dang / rkyen du tshor ba dang / mtshan mar shes pa dang / thams cad nas byed pa dang / rnam par rig pa'i phyir phung po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: kun nas 'dus pa'i phyir rgyu 'dus pa dang / rkyen du tshor ba dang / mtshan mar shes pa dang / thams cad nas byed pa dang / rnam par rig pa'i phyir phung po zhes bya'o //
translated: They are called ‚Äúaggregates‚Äù because they are collected together, because they are the cause of the collection, because they are the feeling of the condition, because they are the perception of the sign, because they are the formation of everything, and because they are the consciousness of all.üîΩThey are called ‚Äúbases‚Äù because they are the door of arising, because they are the door of the object, and because they are the door of the sense faculty.

original: sgor gsal zhing yul la dbang byed pa'i phyir mthong bar dbang ba dang / thos par dbang ba dang / tshor bar dbang ba dang / myong bar dbang ba dang / reg par dbang ba'i phyir dbang po zhes bya'o //üîΩ'bras bur byed pa'i phyir 'dzin par dbang ba dang / mnyen par byed pa dang / chags par byed pa dang / g-yo bar @29a *//
analyzed: sgor gsal zhing yul la dbang byed pa'i phyir mthong bar dbang ba dang / thos par dbang ba dang / tshor bar dbang ba dang / myong bar dbang ba dang / reg par dbang ba'i phyir dbang po zhes bya'o // 'bras bur byed pa'i phyir 'dzin par dbang ba dang / mnyen par byed pa dang / chags par byed pa dang / g-yo bar @29a *//
translated: They are called ‚Äúsense faculties‚Äù because they are the door of seeing, because they are the door of hearing, because they are the door of feeling, because they are the door of experiencing, and because they are the door of touching.üîΩThey are called ‚Äúcauses‚Äù because they are the cause of grasping, because they are the cause of flexibility, because they are the cause of attachment, because they are the cause of movement,

original: 'bud pa dang / skyed par gsal ba dang / dus su red pa'i phyir rgyu zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'bud pa dang / skyed par gsal ba dang / dus su red pa'i phyir rgyu zhes bya'o //
translated: because they are the cause of the arising of the seed, and because they are the cause of ripening in time.

original: rkyen du 'brel pa'i phyir sa bon dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gu dang / ldum bu dang / yal ga dang / sdong po dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / snying po dang / bskams pa'i phyir rkyen zhes bya'o //üîΩmtshan ma skye ba'i phyir mthong ba skye ba dang / snang ba dang / thos pa dang / sgra brnyan dang / tshor ba dang / dri dang / myong ba dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / shes pa dang / chos skye ba'i phyir skye ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rkyen du 'brel pa'i phyir sa bon dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gu dang / ldum bu dang / yal ga dang / sdong po dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / snying po dang / bskams pa'i phyir rkyen zhes bya'o // mtshan ma skye ba'i phyir mthong ba skye ba dang / snang ba dang / thos pa dang / sgra brnyan dang / tshor ba dang / dri dang / myong ba dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / shes pa dang / chos skye ba'i phyir skye ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Because of the connection with conditions, it is called a condition, in the sense of seed, root, sprout, stalk, branch, trunk, leaf, flower, fruit, and core.üîΩBecause of the arising of signs, it is called arising, in the sense of the arising of seeing, light, hearing, sound, feeling, smell, taste, touch, cognition, and phenomena.

original: mtshan ma'i chos nyid can gyi phyir mthong ba'i chos nyid dang / snang ba'i chos dang / lhang nge ba'i chos dang / thos pa'i chos dang / grags pa'i chos dang / gsal ba'i chos dang / tshor ba'i chos dang / dri'i chos dang / tshim pa'i chos dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma'i chos nyid can gyi phyir mthong ba'i chos nyid dang / snang ba'i chos dang / lhang nge ba'i chos dang / thos pa'i chos dang / grags pa'i chos dang / gsal ba'i chos dang / tshor ba'i chos dang / dri'i chos dang / tshim pa'i chos dang /
translated: Because of the nature of signs, it is called the nature of seeing, the nature of light, the nature of clarity, the nature of hearing, the nature of fame, the nature of manifestation, the nature of feeling, the nature of smell, the nature of satisfaction, the nature of touch, the nature of cognition, and the nature of phenomena.

original: myong ba'i chos dang / ro'i chos dang / bro ba'i chos dang / reg pa'i chos dang / reg bya'i chos dang / nges pa'i chos dang / shes pa'i chos dang / chos kyi chos dang / rtogs pa'i chos nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos nyid ces bya'o //üîΩmtshan mar spyod pa'i phyir 'du shes sgyur ba'i spyod pa dang / dbang du spyod pa'i spyod pa dang / rnam par g-yo ba'i spyod pa dang / sgros su 'dogs pa'i spyod @29b pa dang / zla las gal ba'i spyod pa dang / kun tu 'tshig pa'i spyod pa dang /
analyzed: myong ba'i chos dang / ro'i chos dang / bro ba'i chos dang / reg pa'i chos dang / reg bya'i chos dang / nges pa'i chos dang / shes pa'i chos dang / chos kyi chos dang / rtogs pa'i chos nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos nyid ces bya'o // mtshan mar spyod pa'i phyir 'du shes sgyur ba'i spyod pa dang / dbang du spyod pa'i spyod pa dang / rnam par g-yo ba'i spyod pa dang / sgros su 'dogs pa'i spyod @29b pa dang / zla las gal ba'i spyod pa dang / kun tu 'tshig pa'i spyod pa dang /
translated: It is called ‚Äúreality‚Äù because it holds the reality of the Dharma of experience, the Dharma of taste, the Dharma of smell, the Dharma of touch, the Dharma of texture, the Dharma of certainty, the Dharma of cognition, the Dharma of the Dharma, and the reality of realization.üîΩIt is called ‚Äúpractice‚Äù because of the practice of changing perception due to engaging with signs, the practice of engaging with power, the practice of movement, the practice of verbal designation, the practice of being beyond the moon, the practice of being beyond the sun,

original: bla bkyal 'tshal ba'i spyod pa dang / chags pa 'dzin pa'i spyod pa dang / kun tu bdud kyi spyod pa dang / phyin ci log pa'i spyod pa dang / gnyis la brten pa'i spyod pa'i phyir spyod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bla bkyal 'tshal ba'i spyod pa dang / chags pa 'dzin pa'i spyod pa dang / kun tu bdud kyi spyod pa dang / phyin ci log pa'i spyod pa dang / gnyis la brten pa'i spyod pa'i phyir spyod pa zhes bya'o //

original: 'bras bur smin pa'i phyir rdzogs par smin pa dang / rim par smin pa dang / glo bur du smin pa dang / bsgyur te smin pa'i phyir smin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'bras bur smin pa'i phyir rdzogs par smin pa dang / rim par smin pa dang / glo bur du smin pa dang / bsgyur te smin pa'i phyir smin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called ‚Äúripening‚Äù because it ripens into a result, because it ripens gradually, because it ripens suddenly, and because it ripens by transformation.

original: bgrod par byed pa'i phyir gdung ba'i lam dang / 'gog pa'i lam dang / mun pa'i lam dang / 'dam gyi lam dang / yang ba'i phyir lam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bgrod par byed pa'i phyir gdung ba'i lam dang / 'gog pa'i lam dang / mun pa'i lam dang / 'dam gyi lam dang / yang ba'i phyir lam zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called a ‚Äúpath‚Äù because it is a path of heat, a path of cessation, a path of darkness, a path of mire, and a path of lightness.

original: rten par byed pa'i phyir bzod ldan gyi gnas dang / yid ldan gyi gnas dang / mnyam ldan gyi gnas dang / 'dod ldan gyi gnas dang / rtsod ldan gyi gnas dang / dga' ldan la gnas pa'i phyir gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rten par byed pa'i phyir bzod ldan gyi gnas dang / yid ldan gyi gnas dang / mnyam ldan gyi gnas dang / 'dod ldan gyi gnas dang / rtsod ldan gyi gnas dang / dga' ldan la gnas pa'i phyir gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called a ‚Äústage‚Äù because it is the stage of the patient, the stage of the mental, the stage of the even, the stage of the desirous, the stage of the disputatious, and the stage of the joyful.

original: bde ba'i mu bzung ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi mu dang / byed pa dang / dbang phyug gi mu bzung ba'i phyir mu zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i mu bzung ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi mu dang / byed pa dang / dbang phyug gi mu bzung ba'i phyir mu zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called a ‚Äúlimit‚Äù because it is the limit of the essential nature, the limit of activity, and the limit of the almighty, and because it is the limit of happiness.

original: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs /
analyzed: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs /
translated: Great Assembly!

original: rkyen gyi rnal 'byor ni /
analyzed: rkyen gyi rnal 'byor ni /
translated: The yoga of conditions is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: shes pa gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o //
translated: Those who wish to understand a single consciousness should also understand this path.üîΩ

original: de bzhin du don gnyis dang / tshul gsum dang / thabs bzhi dang / chos lnga dang / rigs drug dang / mdzad pa chen po bcu gnyis dang / chos 'phrul chen po bcu gnyis @30a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du don gnyis dang / tshul gsum dang / thabs bzhi dang / chos lnga dang / rigs drug dang / mdzad pa chen po bcu gnyis dang / chos 'phrul chen po bcu gnyis @30a *//
translated: Those who wish to understand one cognition, or to understand the two realities, the three natures, the four means of conversion, the five factors, the six transcendent perfections, the twelve great deeds, the twelve great miracles,

original: dang / ye shes bco brgyad dang / sa'i khyad par bcu gcig dang / sku bzhi dang / lam lnga dang / 'bras bu chen po drug dang / byang chub chen po gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dang / ye shes bco brgyad dang / sa'i khyad par bcu gcig dang / sku bzhi dang / lam lnga dang / 'bras bu chen po drug dang / byang chub chen po gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o //
translated: the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha, the eleven distinctive levels, the four buddha bodies, the five paths, the six great results, and the one great enlightenment, should understand this path.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rang rkyen tsam du spyod cing 'bras bu'i rkyen du 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: rang rkyen tsam du spyod cing 'bras bu'i rkyen du 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is the sole cause of the result, and because it is the sole cause of the result, it is called the sole cause.

original: lam de nyid ma nor bar shes pa'i phyir de shes pa gcig ces bya'o //
analyzed: lam de nyid ma nor bar shes pa'i phyir de shes pa gcig ces bya'o //
translated: Because it is the sole cause of the result, it is called the sole cognition.

original: bden pa gnyis su snang ba'i phyir don gnyis pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis su snang ba'i phyir don gnyis pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Because it is the cause of the two realities, it is called the two realities.

original: mtshan nyid gsum gyis sbyor ba'i phyir kun brtags mthun pa la yod pa'i tshul dang / gzhan dbang mi mthun pa la med pa'i tshul dang / rjes su dpag pa gnyi ga ma yin pa'i phyir tshul zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gsum gyis sbyor ba'i phyir kun brtags mthun pa la yod pa'i tshul dang / gzhan dbang mi mthun pa la med pa'i tshul dang / rjes su dpag pa gnyi ga ma yin pa'i phyir tshul zhes bya'o //
translated: The three realities are so called because they are applied to the imagined reality in the manner of a concordant attribution, to the relative reality in the manner of a discordant non-attribution, and to the perfect reality in the manner of a non-attribution that is also a non-attribution.

original: mkhas pas zin pa'i phyir khyad kyis 'jug pa'i thabs dang / rkyen la sbyor ba'i thabs dang / mngon par 'jug pa'i thabs dang / thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mkhas pas zin pa'i phyir khyad kyis 'jug pa'i thabs dang / rkyen la sbyor ba'i thabs dang / mngon par 'jug pa'i thabs dang / thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs zhes bya'o //
translated: The means are so called because they are the means of engaging in the special, the means of applying to the conditions, the means of direct realization, and the means of completing everything.

original: rang bzhin la gnas pa'i phyir rgyu'i chos dang / lam gyi chos dang / rtogs pa'i chos dang / 'bras bu'i chos la gnas pa'i phyir chos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin la gnas pa'i phyir rgyu'i chos dang / lam gyi chos dang / rtogs pa'i chos dang / 'bras bu'i chos la gnas pa'i phyir chos zhes bya'o //
translated: The Dharma is so called because it is the Dharma of cause, the Dharma of path, the Dharma of realization, and the Dharma of result, which are based on the nature.

original: phyis 'byung bar shes pa'i phyir rgyu'i dran pa dang / 'bras bu'i dran pa dang / sgra'i dran pa dang / sbyor ba'i dran pa dang / gnas kyi dran pa dang / mngon sum pa'i dran pa dang / rig pa'i phyir rig pa drug ces bya'o //üîΩgzhan gyi don du mdzad cing 'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa'i phyir ngo bo'i tshul dang / bltams pa'i tshul dang / rol pa'i tshul dang / @30b mnga' dbang chen po'i tshul dang / thar par gyur pa'i tshul dang / dka' thub chen po'i tshul dang /
analyzed: phyis 'byung bar shes pa'i phyir rgyu'i dran pa dang / 'bras bu'i dran pa dang / sgra'i dran pa dang / sbyor ba'i dran pa dang / gnas kyi dran pa dang / mngon sum pa'i dran pa dang / rig pa'i phyir rig pa drug ces bya'o // gzhan gyi don du mdzad cing 'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa'i phyir ngo bo'i tshul dang / bltams pa'i tshul dang / rol pa'i tshul dang / @30b mnga' dbang chen po'i tshul dang / thar par gyur pa'i tshul dang / dka' thub chen po'i tshul dang /
translated: The six recollections are the recollection of the cause, the recollection of the result, the recollection of the word, the recollection of the application, the recollection of the place, and the recollection of the direct realization, because they are known to occur later.

original: sangs rgyas pa dang / bdud btul ba'i chul dang / 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud btul ba'i tshul dang / cho 'phrul ston pa'i tshul dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul gyi phyir mdzad pa chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa dang / bdud btul ba'i chul dang / 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud btul ba'i tshul dang / cho 'phrul ston pa'i tshul dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul gyi phyir mdzad pa chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: The great deeds are the mode of the essence, the mode of birth, the mode of play, the mode of great sovereignty, the mode of liberation, the mode of great asceticism, the mode of becoming a buddha, the mode of subduing Mara, the mode of turning the wheel, the mode of subduing Mara, the mode of displaying miracles, and the mode of passing into nirvana, because they are engaged in the benefit of beings for the sake of others.

original: sna tshogs su 'phrul pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul dang / snang ba'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / bsam gtan gyi cho 'phrul dang /
analyzed: sna tshogs su 'phrul pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul dang / snang ba'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / bsam gtan gyi cho 'phrul dang /
translated: Because it manifests as a variety, it is the magic display of samadhi, the magic display of appearances, the magic display of miracles, the magic display of declarations, the magic display of instructions, the magic display of concentration,

original: byin rlabs kyi cho 'phrul dang / skye ba'i cho 'phrul dang / stobs kyi cho 'phrul dang / yon tan gyi cho 'phrul dang / 'bras bu'i cho 'phrul dang / de'i phyir cho 'phrul zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byin rlabs kyi cho 'phrul dang / skye ba'i cho 'phrul dang / stobs kyi cho 'phrul dang / yon tan gyi cho 'phrul dang / 'bras bu'i cho 'phrul dang / de'i phyir cho 'phrul zhes bya'o //
translated: the magic display of blessings, the magic display of birth, the magic display of strength, the magic display of qualities, the magic display of fruition, and therefore it is called magic display.

original: phyi nang gi chos thams cad shes pa'i phyir nang gi chos thams cad shes pa dang / phyi'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / phyi nang gi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / stong pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /
analyzed: phyi nang gi chos thams cad shes pa'i phyir nang gi chos thams cad shes pa dang / phyi'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / phyi nang gi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / stong pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /
translated: Because it knows all outer and inner phenomena, it is the wisdom that knows all inner phenomena, the wisdom that knows all outer phenomena, the wisdom that knows all outer and inner phenomena, and the wisdom that knows all empty phenomena.

original: don dam pa'i chos nyid shes pa'i ye shes dang / 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / mtha' mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / dus gsum gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i @31a *//üîΩye shes dang / blang dor mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / chos can gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /
analyzed: don dam pa'i chos nyid shes pa'i ye shes dang / 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / mtha' mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / dus gsum gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i @31a *// ye shes dang / blang dor mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / chos can gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /
translated: the wisdom that knows the ultimate nature, the wisdom that knows all conditioned phenomena, the wisdom that knows all phenomena without reference point, the wisdom that knows all phenomena of the three times,üîΩthe wisdom that knows all phenomena without reference point of adopting and rejecting, the wisdom that knows all phenomena of nature, the wisdom that knows all phenomena of the nature of things, the wisdom that knows all phenomena that apprehend characteristics,

original: dmigs pa med pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / mtshan mar mi rtog pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / dngos po mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / mtshan mar mi rtog pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / dngos po mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /
translated: the wisdom that knows all phenomena without reference point, the wisdom that knows all phenomena without conceptualizing characteristics, the wisdom that knows all phenomena of essence, the wisdom that knows all phenomena without reference point of things,üîΩand the wisdom that knows all phenomena of the nature of things.

original: brten te gnas pa'i phyir mi gos pa'i rig pa dang / mi nyams par rig pa dang / mi sgrib par rig pa dang / rdzogs par rig pa dang / ma g-yos par rig pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du rig pa dang / gnyis su med par rig pa dang /
analyzed: brten te gnas pa'i phyir mi gos pa'i rig pa dang / mi nyams par rig pa dang / mi sgrib par rig pa dang / rdzogs par rig pa dang / ma g-yos par rig pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du rig pa dang / gnyis su med par rig pa dang /
translated: It is called a stage because it is the basis for the knowledge of non-attachment, the knowledge of non-regression, the knowledge of non-obscuration, the knowledge of completion, the knowledge of non-disturbance, the knowledge of equality, the knowledge of non-duality,

original: yongs su dag par rig pa dang / kun tu legs par rig pa dang / de ma thag par rig pa dang / rdzogs par chub pa'i rig pa la brten pa'i phyir sa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su dag par rig pa dang / kun tu legs par rig pa dang / de ma thag par rig pa dang / rdzogs par chub pa'i rig pa la brten pa'i phyir sa zhes bya'o //
translated: the knowledge of purity, the knowledge of complete excellence, the knowledge of immediacy, and the knowledge based on perfect enlightenment.

original: kun tu brjod cing ngo bo nyid du gnas pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dang / chos nyid dang / rdzogs longs spyod pa dang / 'dren par sprul pa'i phyir sku zhes bya'o //
analyzed: kun tu brjod cing ngo bo nyid du gnas pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dang / chos nyid dang / rdzogs longs spyod pa dang / 'dren par sprul pa'i phyir sku zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called a body because it is the basis for the expression of the essence, the essence itself, the reality, the perfect enjoyment, and the emanation of the guide.

original: bgrod cing 'jug pa'i phyir tshogs dang / sbyor ba dang / mthong ba dang / sgom pa @31b dang / mtha' zad du phyin pa'i phyir lam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bgrod cing 'jug pa'i phyir tshogs dang / sbyor ba dang / mthong ba dang / sgom pa @31b dang / mtha' zad du phyin pa'i phyir lam zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called a path because it is the basis for the progress and entry of the path of accumulation, the path of preparation, the path of vision, the path of cultivation, and the path of conclusion.

original: rgyu la don yod pa'i phyir gcig tu rdzogs pa dang / thams cad du mkhyen pa dang / yongs su khyab pa dang / tshogs su 'byung ba dang / kun tu dbang ba dang / dgos pa tshang ba'i phyir 'bras bu zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu la don yod pa'i phyir gcig tu rdzogs pa dang / thams cad du mkhyen pa dang / yongs su khyab pa dang / tshogs su 'byung ba dang / kun tu dbang ba dang / dgos pa tshang ba'i phyir 'bras bu zhes bya'o //
translated: Because the cause is meaningful, it is called the result, because it is complete in one, because it is omniscient, because it is all-pervading, because it arises as a collection, because it is all-powerful, and because it fulfills the purpose.

original: mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir byang chub chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir byang chub chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: Because it is fully perfected, it is called great enlightenment.

original: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs /
analyzed: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs /
translated: Great assembly,

original: 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor ni /üîΩ'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor ni / 'di lta ste /
translated: The yoga of the result is as follows:

original: ma nor ba gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ma nor ba gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, those who wish to understand and realize the unerring single point should understand this path.

original: de bzhin du nges pa gnyis dang / yon tan gsum dang / dgongs pa bzhi dang / chen po lnga dang / tshogs pa drug dang / 'byung tshul bcu gnyis dang / ting nge 'dzin bcu gnyis dang / ye shes chen po bco brgyad dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du nges pa gnyis dang / yon tan gsum dang / dgongs pa bzhi dang / chen po lnga dang / tshogs pa drug dang / 'byung tshul bcu gnyis dang / ting nge 'dzin bcu gnyis dang / ye shes chen po bco brgyad dang /
translated: Similarly, the two certainties, the three qualities, the four intentions, the five greatnesses, the six collections, the twelve modes of arising, the twelve samadhis, the eighteen great wisdoms, the twenty-one specific qualities, and the twenty-five resultant qualities should be understood in this way.

original: rnal 'byor chen po bcu gcig dang / sgrub pa chen po bzhi dang / sbyor ba lnga dang / dngos grub chen po drug dang / rdzogs pa chen po gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po bcu gcig dang / sgrub pa chen po bzhi dang / sbyor ba lnga dang / dngos grub chen po drug dang / rdzogs pa chen po gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know this path if one wishes to be complete in the eleven great yogas, the four great accomplishments, the five applications, the six great powers, and the one great perfection.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyu nyid 'bras bur grub pa'i phyir gtan la phebs pas na /
analyzed: rgyu nyid 'bras bur grub pa'i phyir gtan la phebs pas na /
translated: Because the cause itself is established as the result, it is ascertained.

original: ma nor ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ma nor ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called ‚Äúunerring.‚Äù

original: the tshom mi za ba'i phyir thabs kyis nges pa dang / shes rab kyis nges pas nges pa zhes bya ba'o //üîΩ'dod pa 'byung ba'i phyir yang yongs su khyab pa dang / rlabs su che ba'i yon tan dang / rtsis las 'das @32a *//
analyzed: the tshom mi za ba'i phyir thabs kyis nges pa dang / shes rab kyis nges pas nges pa zhes bya ba'o // 'dod pa 'byung ba'i phyir yang yongs su khyab pa dang / rlabs su che ba'i yon tan dang / rtsis las 'das @32a *//
translated: Because there is no doubt, it is called ‚Äúdefinite‚Äù because of being ascertained by the method and ascertained by wisdom.

original: pa'i phyir yon tan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: pa'i phyir yon tan zhes bya'o //
translated: Because the desired result arises, it is called ‚Äúquality‚Äù because of being all-pervading, possessing vast qualities, and being beyond calculation.

original: thabs kyis ldem por dgongs pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi phyir dus gzhan la dgongs pa dang / gnyen po'i phyir grangs gzhan la dgongs pa dang / bsgyur ba'i phyir don gzhan la dgongs pas na /üîΩdgongs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: thabs kyis ldem por dgongs pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi phyir dus gzhan la dgongs pa dang / gnyen po'i phyir grangs gzhan la dgongs pa dang / bsgyur ba'i phyir don gzhan la dgongs pas na / dgongs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called intention because it is an intention of equality due to the intention of indirect expression by means of skillful method, it is an intention of another time due to its characteristic, it is an intention of another number due to its antidote, and it is an intention of another object due to its transformation.

original: lhag par 'phags pa'i phyir mngon pa dang / bdag nyid chen po dang / de yin pa dang / thams cad du che ba dang / kun tu rdzogs pa'i phyir chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lhag par 'phags pa'i phyir mngon pa dang / bdag nyid chen po dang / de yin pa dang / thams cad du che ba dang / kun tu rdzogs pa'i phyir chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the Great Vehicle because it is superior, because it is the vehicle of the great beings, because it is that, because it is great in every way, and because it is completely perfect.

original: kun nas tshang ba'i phyir mnyam pa chen po dang / 'byor pa chen po dang / 'dus pa chen po dang / rig pa chen po dang / dbang chen po dang / 'dres pa chen po'i phyir tshogs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: kun nas tshang ba'i phyir mnyam pa chen po dang / 'byor pa chen po dang / 'dus pa chen po dang / rig pa chen po dang / dbang chen po dang / 'dres pa chen po'i phyir tshogs zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the collection because it is the great equality, the great prosperity, the great assembly, the great knowledge, the great power, and the great mixture, because it is completely filled.

original: gzhan gyi don du 'byung zhing 'gro ba'i tshul dang mthun pa'i phyir gnas su bskyod pa dang / mnyam par gyur pa dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / spro bar spyod pa dang / gsang bar sbyor ba dang / mtshan ma bcom pa dang /üîΩ'dzad pa med pa dang / seng+ge'i gsung sgra dang / nges par rdzogs pa dang / tsham ngam chen po sprul pa mdzad pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'byung tshul chen po zhes bya'o //

translated: The yoga of aspiration and intention, the yoga of the servant's work, the yoga of the great family, the yoga of the signs, the yoga of the secret door of the scriptures,

original: sgo lung gi rnal 'byor dang / spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dang / mtshan ma rtags kyi rnal 'byor dang / lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rtsal chen sbyong ba'i rnal 'byor dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang /

translated: the yoga of the continuous conduct, the yoga of the signs and marks, the yoga of attaining the great scripture, the yoga of the knowledge holders, the yoga of training in the great power, the yoga of complete perfection,üîΩand the yoga of spontaneous presence.

original: lhun gyis grub pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas pa'i phyir rnal 'byor zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas pa'i phyir rnal 'byor zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called 'yoga'.

original: mnyam pa nyid du grub pa dang / bde ba chen por grub pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par grub pa dang / thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir grub pa chen po zhes bya'o //

original: rgyu dang 'bras bur sbyor ba dang / thabs dang shes rab tu sbyor ba dang / dbyings dang ye shes su sbyor ba dang / sems dang chos su sbyor ba dang / las dang thugs rjer sbyor bas sbyor ba chen po zhes bya'o //

translated: It is called ‚Äúgreat union‚Äù because it is the union of cause and effect, the union of method and wisdom, the union of space and awareness, the union of mind and phenomena, and the union of karma and compassion.

original: srid pa rgya mtsho dbyings su tshim par grub pa dang / 'khor ba rgya mtsho bdag gir grub par gyur pa dang / bdag nyid chen po lhun gyis grub par gyur pa dang / dmigs pa gang yin pa de bzhin grub par gyur pa dang /

translated: It is called ‚Äúgreat accomplishment‚Äù because it accomplishes the satisfaction of the ocean of existence in the dhƒÅtu, it accomplishes the ocean of sa·πÉsƒÅra as one‚Äôs own, it accomplishes the great self as spontaneous, and it accomplishes whatever is visualized.

original: cho 'phrul rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med par grub pa dang / don dam bcud kyis rnam shes rgyas par grub pa'i phyir dngos grub chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: cho 'phrul rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med par grub pa dang / don dam bcud kyis rnam shes rgyas par grub pa'i phyir dngos grub chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called ‚Äúgreat siddhi‚Äù because it accomplishes the unimpeded miracles and magical powers and it accomplishes the expansion of the consciousness with the ultimate elixir.

original: rnam grangs thams cad byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen @33b por rdzogs par grub pa'i phyir rdzogs pa chen po gcig ces bya'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs thams cad byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen @33b por rdzogs par grub pa'i phyir rdzogs pa chen po gcig ces bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pas 'bras bu skye ba'i sa dang / gnas pas mi 'gyur ba'i sa dang / bdal ba chos nyid kyi sa dang / rdzogs pa spyir chib kyi sa ste /
